005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.AbstractCodedMetapathException;
009
010public class JsonFunctionException
011    extends AbstractCodedMetapathException {
012  /**
013   * <a href=
014   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFOJS0003">err:FOJS0003</a>:
015   * This error is raised if the input contains duplicate keys, when the chosen
016   * policy is to reject duplicates.
017   */
018  public static final int DUPLICATE_KEYS = 3;
019
020  /**
021   * <a href=
022   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#ERRFOJS0005">err:FOJS0005</a>:
023   * This error is raised if the $options map contains an invalid entry.
024   */
025  public static final int INVALID_OPTION = 5;
026
027  /**
028   * the serial version UID.
029   */
030  private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
031
032  /**
033   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
034   * and no cause.
035   *
036   * @param code
037   *          the error code value
038   * @param message
039   *          the exception message
040   */
041  public JsonFunctionException(int code, String message) {
042    super(code, message);
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, {@code message},
047   * and {@code cause}.
048   *
049   * @param code
050   *          the error code value
051   * @param message
052   *          the exception message
053   * @param cause
054   *          the original exception cause
055   */
056  public JsonFunctionException(int code, String message, Throwable cause) {
057    super(code, message, cause);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Constructs a new exception with the provided {@code code}, no message, and
062   * the {@code cause}.
063   *
064   * @param code
065   *          the error code value
066   * @param cause
067   *          the original exception cause
068   */
069  public JsonFunctionException(int code, Throwable cause) {
070    super(code, cause);
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public String getCodePrefix() {
075    return "FOJS";
076  }
077}
